alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Mainland Hyde; Tyrrell; Washington (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 2:01PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Washington, northwestern Hyde, east central Beaufort and Tyrrell Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 201 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Snug Harbor to Scranton. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Killkenny, Ponzer, Gum Neck, Kilkenny, Scranton, Columbia, Woodley, Leechville, Scuppernong, Phelps Lake, Frying Pan Landing, Pungo Lake, Alligator Lake and Creswell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
